scripts.lint: DIR=${DIR:-chap2}; $(npm bin)/eslint $DIR/src/*.js; file $DIR/babel | grep -q 'cannot open' && echo 'no babel directory' || eslint $DIR/babel/*.js
scripts.build: DIR=${DIR:-chap2}; file $DIR/babel | grep -q 'cannot open' && echo 'no babel directory' || babel $DIR/babel/*.js -d $DIR/babel/src
